name: Venture Quest (Venture Softworks)
description:
Experience a game unlike any other, a Vocation Simulator, a JRPG Adventure, yet another bloody quirky indie game inspired by the likes of the MOTHER series...

You take the role of a character that you've created! After your mother kicks you out of the house, you must find a job, but after your manager gets involved with a criminal gang, you embark on adventure to defeat the enigmatic Yiygrig. Travel across the land and sea in search of work, friends, and typical JRPG adventure!

FEATURES:

  • Upgrade skills in a Fallout-style professions system
  • Craft items and equipment
  • Change, upgrade and swap classes at will
  • Learn new battle skills and magic in a new system via the main menu
  • Simulate interviews and work shifts
  • Learn new information at the Venture School and upgrade your professions
  • New Game+
  • Plenty of Sidequests to enjoy
  • More features coming soon...

Made in collaboration with Venture Community Services via their Advancement Center program is Venture Quest, coming not quite so soon maybe later perhaps.
